name: Acorns and Caterpillars
description:
Acorns and Caterpillars - Classic two player arcade action.

A Snake/Blockade remix for MiniLD #67.

Player 1: Arrow Keys

Player 2: WASD

It may take a while to load. It will get there (with a little luck!).

  • Game by Tim Cox
  • Sprites by Amanda Cox
  • Made with Muffit

Thanks for playing!

Edit: Some things playing up with web version. Windows download (below) recommended.
